title: Shannen Doherty made her first red carpet appearance since finishing chemo, and she was glowing
text:
Shannen Doherty made her first red carpet appearance since finishing chemo, and she was glowing Throughout her battle with breast cancer, Shannen Doherty has truly been a pillar of strength; often posting inspiring messages and photos on Instagram right after a chemotherapy session, or even dancing at the gym just hours after treatment.
So it’s no surprise that Doherty hit the red carpet after finishing chemotherapy , and we couldn’t be happier for how far she’s come. Not only did she step out on the red carpet looking absolutely beautiful, but she took on the role of hosting the Animal Hope & Wellness Foundation’s gala event . And as always, Doherty maintained her unwavering positivity when talking about her journey with cancer. “I feel great. I mean, I feel good, I’m super-positive, I’m happy with where I’m at right now. Cancer, for me, as hard as it is, has been a blessing. It has changed who I am as a human being forever. It’s altered my life in ways I can’t even speak of,” she told Us Weekly .
Rodin Eckenroth/Getty Images Her speech was equally fierce, and we she even shared what has helped get her through her darkest times.
“Cancer can be isolating and depressing, can be all-consuming. Cancer can overwhelm your life. Seeing animals being rescued touched my heart and they renew my determination to dig deep and continue my own personal fight. I wonder how I would fare faced with such death and cruelty. … [Animals] encouraged me to face adversity with the same strength and grace that they display in the face of destruction.” A post shared by ShannenDoherty (@theshando) on Feb 14, 2017 at 9:02pm PST 
Here she is at the event with her hubby Kurt Iswarienko. Together, they emit all the good vibes.
Tonight @animalhopeandwellness full house and with my love @kurtiswarienko #ahwfgala 
A post shared by ShannenDoherty (@theshando) on Mar 4, 2017 at 8:46pm PST 
Without question, Shannen Doherty is one badass cancer slayer . She’s never afraid to share of herself during difficult experiences, and that level of honesty and vulnerability is not something you see every day. Looking forward to continuing receiving inspiration from this amazing human.
